data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module transparently converts between astronomical filter (eg
    J, H and K in the infrared) to the associated wavelength and
    frequency. It can support multiple telescopes and instruments and
    eases the writing of cross-telescope software.

    Interest has already been expressed in this module from other UK
    telescopes.

    No other modules provide this functionality.
